Articles.Content:
Hey hey fellow kergenieers:

Pirx reporting from the sunny Spain.

All these posts are more or less the same so Ill be brief, I've been playing KSP for some days and lurking in the forum for some time too so I've decided it was time to set up my account.

Its really nice to be here and I hope ill be able to learn quite a lot of things from you guys ^^

See ya!

It's always fun learning new things, I'll vouch that [for the most part, especially here]

I'll be quick: Cookies over there, beverages in the fridge, and we're just putting on some rave music!

> 
> I'll be quick: Cookies over there, beverages in the fridge, and we're just putting on some rave music!

Wow, you didn't showed me were the beverages are, or even the cookies and you didn't played music too! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
